languages.text: "Я не успел побывать на Райкади Филии до того, как на основной планете вспыхнуло восстание. Из рапорта я читал, что комендант проявляет... необычную изобретательность в обращении с заточенными на планетоиде".

"I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."
languages.original_text: "Я не успел побывать на Райкади Филии до того, как на основной планете вспыхнуло восстание. Из рапорта я читал, что комендант проявляет... необычную изобретательность в обращении с заточенными на планетоиде".

traits.locale_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我一直都没找到机会造访莱卡德菲利亚星，直到主世界爆发叛乱为止。我曾读过一份报告，说这里的典狱长在处理行星上的囚犯时，表现出了……不同寻常的创造力。”
languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."

traits.locale_text: “我一直都没找到机会造访莱卡德菲利亚星，直到主世界爆发叛乱为止。我曾读过一份报告，说这里的典狱长在处理行星上的囚犯时，表现出了……不同寻常的创造力。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No tuve oportunidad de visitar Rykadi Philia antes del levantamiento en el mundo principal. Leí en un informe que su alcaide demuestra un... ingenio excepcional a la hora de lidiar con los prisioneros del planetoide».
languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."

traits.locale_text: «No tuve oportunidad de visitar Rykadi Philia antes del levantamiento en el mundo principal. Leí en un informe que su alcaide demuestra un... ingenio excepcional a la hora de lidiar con los prisioneros del planetoide».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「原初惑星で反乱が起こるまで、私はラカディ・フィリアを訪れることはなかった。報告書で読んだのだが、刑務官は小惑星での囚人の扱いに、一風変わった工夫をしていたそうだ」
languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."

traits.locale_text: 「原初惑星で反乱が起こるまで、私はラカディ・フィリアを訪れることはなかった。報告書で読んだのだが、刑務官は小惑星での囚人の扱いに、一風変わった工夫をしていたそうだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte keine Gelegenheit, Rykadi Philia zu besuchen, ehe auf der Hauptwelt der Aufstand ausbrach. Ich habe in einem Bericht gelesen, dass der Direktor hinsichtlich ... der Behandlung von Gefangenen auf dem Planetoiden ungewöhnlich einfallsreich war."
languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte keine Gelegenheit, Rykadi Philia zu besuchen, ehe auf der Hauptwelt der Aufstand ausbrach. Ich habe in einem Bericht gelesen, dass der Direktor hinsichtlich ... der Behandlung von Gefangenen auf dem Planetoiden ungewöhnlich einfallsreich war."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de me rendre sur Rykadi Philia avant que la révolte éclate sur le monde principal. D'après certains rapports, le directeur du planétoïde carcéral faisait preuve d'une certaine... ingéniosité dans sa gestion des prisonniers. »
languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de me rendre sur Rykadi Philia avant que la révolte éclate sur le monde principal. D'après certains rapports, le directeur du planétoïde carcéral faisait preuve d'une certaine... ingéniosité dans sa gestion des prisonniers. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ana dünyada ayaklanma başlamadan önce Rykadi Philia'yı ziyaret etme şansım olmamıştı. Bir raporda okuduğuma göre hapishane başkanı, gezegendeki mahkûmlarla olağan dışı bir beceriyle başa çıkabiliyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I did not have the opportunity to visit Rykadi Philia before the uprising broke out on the primary world. I read in a report that the warden has shown... unusual ingenuity in how he handles prisoners on the planetoid."
